items.title: Fit case to recall judgment, consider matter afresh: SC bench on JSW Steel and lenders' plea
items.description: The comments by the apex court bench brought relief to stakeholders of JSW Steel, with the shares of JSW Steel at the day's high soon after the hearing commenced.

items.title: Mahindra & Mahindra shifts to high gear
items.description: Q1 performance reaffirms strength in core segments

items.title: Gabriel India: Primed for growth but priced to perfection
items.description: Forays into new segments like sunroof, inorganic and organic strategies show the company’s confidence in the future.

items.title: Indus Towers’ Q1 profit slumps 9.8% despite Vodafone Idea payments
items.description: The passive infrastructure company, now a Bharti Airtel subsidiary, posted a 9.1 percent revenue growth to Rs 8,058 crore, but total expenses jumped 29.2 percent

items.title: Meta seizes its moment to spend more aggressively in the AI race
items.description: Investors cheered the plan, sending shares up more than 10% in after-hours trading

items.title: Microsoft set to hit $4 trillion market cap after earnings beat
items.description: Microsoft reported better-than-expected growth in its cloud business, and its closely-watched Azure cloud-computing unit posted a 39% rise in sales, handily beating the 34% analysts expected
